scripts.postinstall: grep tmp .gitignore || echo 'tmp' >> .gitignore; git checkout gh-pages && grep tmp .gitignore || echo 'tmp' >> .gitignore
scripts.test: cd src; jade -o '{ filename: "." }' -O ../tmp *jade; cd .. && cp -av assets tmp; npm run-script open
scripts.doc: git checkout gh-pages; cd .; rm -rf assets *html && mv tmp/* . && git commit -a -m 'regenerated docs'; npm run-script open; echo git checkout master
